title: Taffy
description: Taffy. It’s chewy, stretchy, and a little salty. And it’s what I have in my mouth during my first lip lock with a man twice my age. It’s sudden. It’s unexpected. It changes my world in the most amazing way.You see, Troy Dante isn’t just anyone. He’s the man who lives next door, and he’s also my best friend’s father.He had her young, but still, this is going to create some waves.But the heart wants what the heart wants, right?And I think I want to be my best friend’s stepmom…Warning: this quick read contains over-the-top declarations, undeclared insta-love and molten hot moments between a younger curvy girl and the hot single dad next door.
author: Megan Wade
